tool.name: SAGA.grid_analysis.19
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID_1 False isArrayGRID_2 False isArrayDTM_1 False isArrayDTM_2 False output_data_CORRPOINTS $output_data_CORRPOINTS output_data_CORRLINES $output_data_CORRLINES name SAGA.grid_analysis.19 GRID_1 $GRID_1 GRID_2 $GRID_2 DTM_1 $DTM_1 DTM_2 $DTM_2 SEARCH_CHIPSIZE $SEARCH_CHIPSIZE REF_CHIPSIZE $REF_CHIPSIZE GRID_SPACING $GRID_SPACING prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CORRPOINTS $OutputSection_CORRPOINTS.outputType_CORRPOINTS transmissionMode_CORRPOINTS $OutputSection_CORRPOINTS.transmissionMode_CORRPOINTS outputType_CORRLINES $OutputSection_CORRLINES.outputType_CORRLINES transmissionMode_CORRLINES $OutputSection_CORRLINES.transmissionMode_CORRLINES

param.name: GRID_1
param.label: Grid 1
param.help: The first grid to correlate The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff

param.name: GRID_2
param.label: Grid 2
param.help: The second grid to correlate The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff

param.name: DTM_1
param.label: DTM 1
param.help: The first DTM used to assign height information to grid 1 The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff

param.name: DTM_2
param.label: DTM 2
param.help: The second DTM used to assign height information to grid 2 The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff

param.name: SEARCH_CHIPSIZE
param.label: Search Chip Size (Cells)
param.help: Chip size of search chip, used to find correlating reference chip

param.name: REF_CHIPSIZE
param.label: Reference Chip Size (Cells)
param.help: Chip size of reference chip to be found in search chip

param.name: GRID_SPACING
param.label: Grid Spacing (Map Units)
param.help: Grid spacing used for the construction of correlated points [map units]

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CORRPOINTS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CORRPOINTS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_CORRLINES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CORRLINES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: The tool performs an image correlation based on two raster data sets. Additionally, two DTMs can be given and used to optain 3D displacement vectors.<br/>This is a SAGA implementation of the standalone IMCORR software provided by the National Snow and Ice Data Center in Boulder, Colorado / US.
